question.qText: Under King Jamesâ€™ view of politics, what would happen to Parliament?

aBtn.aText: <font size=''>Parliament retains all power and authority.</font>
<font size='16'>Parliament would lose all power and authority.</font>
<font size='16'>Any act of Parliament could, by rights, be mitigated or reversed by order of the king.</font>
<font size='16'>Parliament would come to accept their diminished role in government and become an informal advisory body to the king.</font>
